recruitment_mission.name: recruitment mission

action.description: You may put bought cards on top of unplayed pile

recruitment_mission.description: get 1 persuasion and may put bought cards on top of unplayed pile

concentration.name: concentration

action.description: mix your unplayed pile and discard pile into new unplayed pile and take card from the top

concentration.description: mix your unplayed pile and discard pile into new unplayed pile and take card from the top

calculated_recruitment.name: calculated recruitment

action.description: take your mentat from his station in Landsraad

calculated_recruitment.description: pay 1 Spice to take your mentat from his station in Landsraad

infiltration.name: infiltration

action.description: you may send your next agent on already occupied location

infiltration.description: you may send your next agent on already occupied location

poison_detector.name: poison detector

action.description: check card from the top of your unplayed pile - take it or destroy it

poison_detector.description: check card from the top of your unplayed pile - take it or destroy it

market_manopoly.name: market manopoly

requirement.description: you are the person with the highest number of this cards (not execquo)

market_manopoly.description: if you have at least 2 'The Spice Must Flow' cards, gain 1 VP, if you are the person with the highest number of this cards, gain 1 VP

demand_for_a_respect.name: demand for an respect
demand_for_a_respect.description: if you win the conflict you may gain one influence point or exchange 2 Spice for 2 influence points

master_tactitian.name: master of tactics

action.description: withdraw up to 3 troops to your garnison from conflict

master_tactitian.description: gain 3 faight points or withdraw up to 3 troops to your garnison from conflict

consequences_of_victory.name: consequences of victory
consequences_of_victory.description: if you win the conflict you may gain 3 Spice

dispatching_an_envoy.name: dispatching an envoy

action.description: change symbols (cancel actual and gain new ones) of your card on - emperor,guild,fremen and bene gesserit

dispatching_an_envoy.description: change symbols (cancel actual ones and gain new ones) of your card on - emperor,guild,fremen and bene gesserit

trick.name: trick

exchange.description:: player you choose lose 1 troops from conflict ( if he has any) and you send to conflict 1 troop from your garnison

trick.description: pay 1 solari to: player you choose lose 1 troops from conflict ( if he has any) and you send to conflict 1 troop from your garnison

support.name: support

gain.description: if you use this card during reaveal phase , you may send any of your troops to conflict immediatelly after playing this card

support.description: exchange 3 solari for 3 troops and if you use this card during reaveal phase , you may send any of your troops to conflict immediatelly after playing this card

water of life.name: water of life

gain.description: take 3 card from your unplayed pile

water of life.description: echange 1 Spice and 1 water to get 3 card from your unplayed pile

agreement_from_high_council.name: agreement from high council

requirement.description: if you have a place in high council

agreement_from_high_council.description: if you have a place in high council you gain 2 Spice

bindu_lethargy.name: Bindu Lethargy

action.description: At the start of your turn: take a card from unplayed pile and You may skip your turn (instead of an agent turn or reveal turn).

bindu_lethargy.description: At the start of your turn: take a card from unplayed pile and You may skip your turn (instead of an agent turn or reveal turn).

plans_within_plans.name: Plans Within Plans

requirement.description: at least 3 influence on 3 faction tracks
at least 3 influence on 4 faction tracks

plans_within_plans.description: If you have at least 3 influence on 3 faction tracks, gain 1 VP. —OR— If you have at least 3 influence on 4 faction tracks, gain 2 VP.

bypass_protocol.name: Bypass Protocol

action1.description: Gain a card costing 3 or less

action2.description: Gain a card costing 5 or less and put it on top of your unplayed pile

bypass_protocol.description: gain a card cost 3 persuasion or less.-OR- pay 2 spice to get a card costing 5 or less and put it on top of your unplayed pile.

charisma.name: Charisma
charisma.description: Gain 2 persuasion on your reveal turn this round.

sudden_mobilization.name: Sudden Mobilization

action.description: Deploy to the conflict any number of troops from your garrison.

sudden_mobilization.description: Deploy to the conflict any number of troops from your garrison.

allied_armada.name: Allied Armada

requirement.description: if you have any fraction token (alliance)

allied_armada.description: If you have any faction alliance: Pay 2 Spice to gain 7 fight points.

tie_breaker.name: Tie Breaker
tie_breaker.description: Fight: Gain 2 fight points. —OR— Endgame:  gain 10 Spice.

feigned_incident.name: Feigned Incident
feigned_incident.description: Lose 3 of your troops in the conflict to gain 1 VP.
